TR_ASKED_ENTER_YOUR_PASSPHRASE_TO_UNLOCK: You will be asked to enter your passphrase to unlock your hidden wallet.
TR_ATTENTION_COLON_THE_LOG_CONTAINS: Attention: The log contains your XPUBs. Anyone with your XPUBs can see your account history.
TR_BACKUP_FINISHED_TEXT: Backup is now on your recovery seed card. Once again dont lose it and keep it private!
TR_BACKUP_SUBHEADING_1: Your {TR_SEED_MANUAL_LINK} is the backup key to all your cryptocurrencies and applications.
TR_BACKUP_SUBHEADING_2: Your recovery seed can only be displayed once. Never make a digital copy of your recovery seed and never upload it online. Keep your recovery seed in a safe place.
TR_BOOKMARK_SUBHEADING: Protect yourself against {TR_PHISHING_ATTACKS}. Bookmark Trezor Wallet (wallet.trezor.io) to avoid visiting fake sites.
TR_BRIDGE_IS_RUNNING: Trezor bridge is up and running
TR_BRIDGE_SUBHEADING: Trezor Bridge is a communication tool to facilitate the connection between your Trezor and your internet browser.
TR_CAMERA_PERMISSION_DENIED: Permission to access the camera was denied.
TR_CHANGE_PASSPHRASE_SETTINGS_TO_USE: Change passphrase settings to use this device
TR_CLICK_HERE_TO_ACCESS_YOUR_HIDDEN: Click here to access your hidden wallet.
TR_CLICK_HERE_TO_ACCESS_YOUR_STANDARD: Click here to access your standard or another hidden wallet.
TR_CONNECT_YOUR_TREZOR_TO_CHECK: Connect your Trezor to verify this address
TR_CONNECTED_DEVICE_IS_IN_BOOTLOADER: Connected device is in bootloader mode. Reconnect it to continue.
TR_CONTINUE_TO_ACCESS_STANDARD_WALLET: Continue to access your standard wallet.
TR_DATA_IS_USUALLY_USED: Data is usually used when you send transactions to contracts.
TR_DESTINATION_TAG_IS_NOT_NUMBER: Destination tag is not a number
TR_DEVICE_DISCONNECTED_DURING_ACTION_DES: You device disconnected during action which resulted in interuption of backup process. For security reasons you need to wipe your device now and start the backup process again.
TR_DEVICE_IN_BOOTLOADER_MODE_INSTRUCTION: Device is connected in bootloader mode. Plug out the USB cable and connect device again.
TR_DEVICE_IS_USED_IN_OTHER_WINDOW_HEADIN: Device is used in other window
TR_DEVICE_IS_USED_IN_OTHER_WINDOW_TEXT: This is a big no no. Please dont use device in other window. Close all other windows or tabs that might be using your Trezor device.
TR_DEVICE_NOT_RECOGNIZED_TRY_INSTALLING: Device not recognized? Try installing the {link}.
TR_DEVICE_SETTINGS_PASSPHRASE_DESC: Passphrase encryption adds an extra custom word to your recovery seed. This allows you to access new wallets, each hidden behind a particular passphrase. Your old accounts will be accessible with an empty passphrase.
TR_DEVICE_SETTINGS_PASSPHRASE_DESC_MORE: If you forget your passphrase, your wallet is lost for good. There is no way to recover your funds.
TR_DEVICE_SETTINGS_PIN_PROTECTION_DESC: Using PIN protection is highly recommended. PIN prevents unauthorized persons from stealing your funds even if they have physical access to your device.
TR_DEVICE_USED_IN_OTHER: Device is used in other window
TR_DEVICE_YOU_RECONNECTED_IS_DIFFERENT: Device you reconnected is different from the previous device. Connect the right one.
TR_DID_YOU_PURCHASE: Please note, that device packaging including holograms have changed over time. You can check packaging details {TR_PACKAGING_LINK}. Also be sure you made your purchase from {TR_RESELLERS_LINK}. Otherwise, the device you are holding in your hands might be a counterfeit. Please {TR_CONTACT_OUR_SUPPORT_LINK}
TR_DISCONNECT_DEVICE_TEXT: Your device is wiped and might be safely sold on ebay. No one will ever be able to steal your funds.
TR_DO_NOT_SAFE_IN_COMPUTER_INSTRUCTION: Do not write it into a computer
TR_DO_NOT_TAKE_PHOTO_INSTRUCTION: Do not take a photo of your recovery seed
TR_DO_NOT_UPLOAD_INSTRUCTION: Do not upload words on the internet
TR_DONT_UPGRADE_BRIDGE: No, I don't want to upgrade Bridge now
TR_DOUBLE_CLICK_IT_TO_RUN_INSTALLER: Double click it to run installer
TR_EMAIL_SKIPPED: You chose not to provide your email. This is Ok. If you want, you might still follow us on socials:
TR_ENTER_PIN_TEXT: Your device gets locked anytime you disconnect it. You now need to enter your PIN to continue.
TR_ENTER_SEED_WORDS_INSTRUCTION: Enter words from your seed in order displayed on your device.
TR_ENTERED_PIN_NOT_CORRECT: Entered PIN for "{deviceLabel}" is not correct
TR_FIAT_RATES_ARE_NOT_CURRENTLY: Fiat rates are not currently available.
TR_FINAL_SUBHEADING: Now you are ready to enjoy bleeding edge security with Trezor.
TR_FIND_MORE_INFORMATION_ON_TREZOR_WIKI: Find more information on Trezor Wiki.
TR_FIRMWARE_INSTALLED: Perfect. The newest firmware is installed. Time to continue
TR_FIRMWARE_INSTALLED_TEXT: This device has already installed firmware version: {version}
TR_FIRMWARE_SUBHEADING: Your Trezor is shipped without firmware installed to ensure that you can get started with the latest features right away. The authenticity of the installed firmware is always checked during device start. If the firmware is not correctly signed by SatoshiLabs, your Trezor will display a warning.
TR_FIRST_PIN_ENTERED: Good. You entered a new pin. But to make sure you did not make mistake, please enter it again. Look at your device now, numbers are now different.
TR_FORGETTING_ONLY_REMOVES_THE_DEVICE_FR: Forgetting only removes the device from the list on the left, your coins are still safe and you can access them by reconnecting your Trezor again.
TR_FOUND_OK_DEVICE: Found an empty device, yay! You can continue now.
TR_GAS_LIMIT_REFERS_TO: Gas limit refers to the maximum amount of gas user is willing to spend on a particular transaction. {TR_GAS_QUOTATION}. Increasing the gas limit will not get the transaction confirmed sooner. Default value for sending {gasLimitTooltipCurrency} is {gasLimitTooltipValue}.
TR_GAS_PRICE_QUOTATION: Transaction fee = gas limit * gas price
TR_GAS_PRICE_REFERS_TO: Gas price refers to the amount of ether you are willing to pay for every unit of gas, and is usually measured in “Gwei”. {TR_GAS_PRICE_QUOTATION}. Increasing the gas price will get the transaction confirmed sooner but makes it more expensive. The recommended gas price is {recommendedGasPrice} GWEI.
TR_GAS_QUOTATION: Transaction fee = gas limit * gas price
TR_HIDE_BALANCE_EXPLAINED: Hides your account balance so you don't have to worry about anyone looking over your shoulder.
TR_HOLOGRAM_STEP_SUBHEADING: Please make sure hologram protecting your device is authentic
TR_I_HAVE_READ_INSTRUCTIONS: I have read the instructions and agree
TR_IF_WRONG_PASSPHRASE: If you enter a wrong passphrase, you will not unlock the desired hidden wallet.
TR_IF_YOUR_DEVICE_IS_EVER_LOST: If your device is ever lost or damaged, your funds will be lost. Backup your device first, to protect your coins against such events.
TR_INSERT_TOKEN_NAME: Insert token name, symbol or address to be able to send it.
TR_INSTALLING: Do not disconnect your device. Installing
TR_INSTANCE_NAME_IN_USE: Instance name is already in use
TR_INSTRUCTION_TO_SKIP: You should skip setup and continue to wallet and check if you have any funds on this device.
TR_IS_NOT_NEW_DEVICE: According to your decision in a previous step, this was supposed to be a fresh device. But we were able to detect already installed firmware on it.
TR_LEARN_MORE_ABOUT_LATEST_VERSION: Learn more about latest version in {TR_CHANGELOG}.
TR_LOOKS_LIKE_IT_IS_DEVICE_LABEL: Looks like it is {deviceLabel} Account #{number} address of {network} network
TR_MAKE_SURE_IT_IS_WELL_CONNECTED: Make sure your device is well connected to avoid communication failures.
TR_MAKE_SURE_YOU_DOWNLOAD_THE_UNIVERSAL: Make sure you download the Universal Client for Trezor support.
TR_NAME_BORING: Nah.. too boring, chose a different label
TR_NAME_CHANGED_TEXT: Excellent, your device has a custom name now. It will be visible on your device display from now on.
TR_NAME_ONLY_ASCII: Name can contain only basic letters
TR_NAME_SUBHEADING: Personalize your device with your own name.
TR_NEW_COMMUNICATION_TOOL: New communication tool to facilitate the connection between your Trezor and your internet browser.
TR_NEWSLETTER_SUBHEADING: Receive information on important security updates
PASSPHRASE_BLANK: Leave passphrase blank to access your default wallet
TR_PASSPHRASE_IS_OPTIONAL_FEATURE: Passphrase is an optional feature of the Trezor device that is recommended for advanced users only. It is a word or a sentence of your choice. Its main purpose is to access a hidden wallet.
TR_PIN_ENTERING_DESCRIPTION: In order to secure maximum security, we do not display pin on your computer. We will just show a blind matrix, real layout is displayed on your device.
TR_PIN_ERROR_TROUBLESHOOT: Are you confused, how PIN works? You can always refer to our {TR_DOCUMENTATION}
TR_PIN_SET_SUCCESS: Purfect! Your device is now secured by pin.
TR_PIN_SUBHEADING: Protect device from unauthorized access by using a strong pin.
TR_PLEASE_CONNECT_YOUR_DEVICE: Please connect your device to continue with the verification process
TR_PLEASE_DISABLE_PASSPHRASE: Please disable passphrase settings to continue with the verification process.
TR_PLEASE_ENABLE_PASSPHRASE: Please enable passphrase settings to continue with the verification process.
TR_PLEASE_RELOAD_THE_PAGE_DOT: Please check your Internet connection and reload the page.
TR_RANDOM_SEED_WORDS_DISCLAIMER: Please note, that to maximaze security, your device will ask you to enter {count} fake words that are not part of your seed.
TR_RECONNECT_INSTRUCTION: Reconnect your device and wait for a while
TR_RECONNECT_TEXT: We lost connection with your device. This might mean:
TR_RECONNECT_TROUBLESHOOT_BRIDGE: Trezor bridge might have stopped working, try restarting
TR_RECONNECT_TROUBLESHOOT_CABEL: Cable is broken, try another one
TR_RECONNECT_TROUBLESHOOT_CONNECTION: Device is not well connected to the cable
TR_RECOVER_SUBHEADING: It is possible to re-create device from bip39 backup. First of all, chose number of words of your backup.
TR_RECOVER_SUBHEADING_MODEL_T: On model T the entire recovery process is doable on device.
TR_RECOVERY_SUCCESS: Excellent, you recovered device from seed.
TR_RECOVERY_TYPES_DESCRIPTION: Both methods are safe. Basic recovery uses on computer input of words in randomized order. Advanced recovery uses on-screen input to load your recovery seed. {TR_LEARN_MORE_LINK}
TR_REQUEST_INSTANCE_DESCRIPTION: Passphrase is an optional feature of the Trezor device that is recommended for advanced users only. It is a word or a sentence of your choice. Its main purpose is to access a hidden wallet.
TR_RIPPLE_ADDRESSES_REQUIRE_MINIMUM_BALA: Ripple addresses require a minimum balance of {minBalance} XRP to activate and maintain the account. {TR_LEARN_MORE}
TR_SATOSHILABS_CANNOT_BE_HELD_RESPONSIBL: SatoshiLabs cannot be held responsible for security liabilities or financial losses resulting from not following security instructions described here.
TR_SEARCHING_TAKES_TOO_LONG: Searching for your device takes too long, you might want to try to:
TR_SECURITY_SUBHEADING: Good job, your wallet is ready. But we strongly recommend you to spend few more minutes and improve your security.
TR_SEED_IS_MORE_IMPORTANT_THAN_YOUR_DEVI: Seed is more important than your device
TR_SHOW_ADDRESS_I_WILL_TAKE_THE_RISK: Show address, I will take the risk
TR_TAKE_ME_BACK_TO_WALLET: Take me back to the wallet
TR_TAKE_ME_TO_BITCOIN_WALLET: Take me to the Bitcoin wallet
TR_THANK_YOU_FOR_EMAIL: Thank you for providing your email. To complete subscription, please click on the link we sent to your email. You can also follow us on socials:
TR_THE_CHANGES_ARE_SAVED: The changes are saved automatically as they are made
TR_THE_PIN_LAYOUT_IS_DISPLAYED: The PIN layout is displayed on your Trezor.
TR_THIS_WILL_CREATE_NEW_INSTANCE: This will create new instance of device which can be used with different passphrase
TR_TO_ACCESS_OTHER_WALLETS: To access other wallets please connect your device.
TR_TO_ADD_A_NEW_ACCOUNT_LAST: To add a new account, last account must have some transactions.
TR_TO_ADD_ACCOUNTS: To add accounts, make sure your device is connected.
TR_TO_PREVENT_PHISHING_ATTACKS_COMMA: To prevent phishing attacks, you should verify the address on your Trezor first. {claim}
TR_TREZOR_ETHEREUM_WALLET_DESCRIPTION: New wallet with support of Ethereum and Ripple
TR_TREZOR_PASSWORD_MANAGER_DESCRIPTION: A safe way how to manage your credentials with Trezor.
TR_TREZOR_STABLE_WALLET_DESCRIPTION: Web wallet with support of Bitcoin, Dash, Zcash and other coins.
TR_TREZOR_WALLET_IS_AN_EASY_DASH: Trezor Wallet is an easy-to-use interface for your Trezor. Trezor Wallet allows you to easily control your funds, manage your balance and initiate transfers.
TR_TYPE_IN_A_TOKEN_NAME: Type in a token name or a token address.
TR_UNKOWN_ERROR_SEE_CONSOLE: Unknown error. See console logs for details.
TR_UNVERIFIED_ADDRESS_COMMA_CONNECT: Unverified address, connect your Trezor to verify it
TR_USE_YOUR_DEVICE_IN_THIS_WINDOW: Do you want to use your device in this window?
TR_USER_HAS_NOT_WORKDED_WITH_THIS_DEVICE: It is a brand new device, just unpacked
TR_USER_HAS_NOT_WORKED_WITH_THIS_DEVICE_: In that case you should immediately contact Trezor support with detailed information on your purchase and refrain from using this device.
TR_USER_HAS_WORKDED_WITH_THE_DEVICE: I have worked with it before
TR_TESTNET_COINS_EXPLAINED: Testnet coins dont have any value but you still may use them to learn and experiment.
TR_WAIT_FOR_REBOOT: Wait for your device to reboot
TR_PLEASE_COMPARE_YOUR_ADDRESS: Please compare your address on device with address shown bellow
TR_WE_HAVE_PARTNERED_UP_WITH_THE_NEM: We have partnered up with the NEM Foundation to provide you with a full-fledged NEM Wallet.
TR_WE_THANK_OUR_TRANSLATORS: We thank our translators for their {TR_CONTRIBUTION}
TR_WELCOME_TO_TREZOR_TEXT: Let us take you through a short setup.
TR_WOULD_YOU_LIKE_TREZOR_WALLET_TO: Would you like Trezor Wallet to forget your {deviceCount, plural, one {device} other {devices}} or to remember {deviceCount, plural, one {it} other {them}}, so that it is still visible even while disconnected?
TR_XRP_DESTINATION_TAG_EXPLAINED: Destination tag is an arbitrary number which serves as a unique identifier of your transaction. Some services may require this to process your transaction.
TR_YOU_ARE_IN_YOUR_WALLET: You are in your hidden wallet.
TR_YOU_ARE_IN_YOUR_STANDARD_WALLET: You are in your standard wallet.
TR_YOU_CANNOT_ADD_MORE_THAN_10_ACCOUNTS: You cannot add more than 10 accounts
TR_YOU_WILL_BE_REDIRECTED_TO_EXTERNAL: You will be redirected to external wallet
TR_YOU_WILL_GAIN_ACCESS: You will gain access to receiving & sending selected coin
TR_YOUR_TREZOR_IS_NOT_BACKED_UP: Your Trezor is not backed up
TR_THIS_IS_PLACE_TO_SEE_ALL: This is a place to see all your devices. You can further set them up in Settings but here you can switch between devices and see their statuses.
TR_NUM_ACCOUNTS_NUM_COINS_FIAT_VALUE: {accountsCount} {accountsCount, plural, one {account} other {accounts}} - {coinsCount} {coinsCount, plural, one {coin} other {coins}} - {fiatValue}
TR_RECOVERY_SEED_IS: Recovery seed is a list of words in a specific order which store all the information needed.
TR_WIPING_YOUR_DEVICE: Wiping the device removes all its information. Only wipe your device if you have your device if you have your recovery seed at hand or there are no funds stored on this device.
TR_YOUR_LABELS_WILL_BE_SAVED: Your labels will be saved in Dropbox folder and synced across devices
TR_3RD_PARTY_WALLETS_DESC: These coins are supported by Trezor but only in 3rd party wallets. These coins cannot be managed by Trezor Suite or Wallet.
TR_BACKUP_FAILED: Backup failed and your Wallet is not backed up. You can still use it without any problems but highly recommend you following the link and see how to successfully create a backup.
TR_START_HEADING: Create new or restore your Trezor Wallet
TR_START_TEXT: Trezor Wallet is your account within Trezor ecosystem. It allows you to easily manage your funds and initiate transfers.
